plot: "Town and Out" When the Professor gets a new job, the Girls have to move to a new town. They try to make the best of it, but it's just not the same. In fact, it's awful.

"Town and Out" When the Professor gets a new job, the Girls have to move to a new town. They try to make the best of it, but it's just not the same thing like Townsville. In fact, it's awful. It because Citiesville is a very dirty and very polluted town where people are always angry and irritated, everyone are unfriendly in this town. Worst of all, A high property damage is caused and the girls are being mistreated and abused by someone in Citiesville who don't know them. Having had enough of a town so polluted and so noisy, one can't even finish these people's bad mood. But they need to get back to Townsville, but how? Convincing the Professor to come back. "Child Fearing" Mojo Jojo is hired to "babysit" the Powerpuff Girls. The girls decide to have fun to make Mojo Jojo's life hell with some pranks.—Lucas Moura Quaresma
